item.title: 三色票据持有人起诉摩根大通、巴克莱和第五第三银行
item.description: 三色控股公司（Tricolor Holdings）发行的票据持有人起诉摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）、巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和第五第三银行（Fifth Third Bancorp），指控这些银行协助延续了这家现已破产的二手车经销商和贷款机构的欺诈行为。【原文：Holders of notes issued by Tricolor Holdings sued JPMorgan Chase & Co., Barclays Plc and Fifth Third Bancorp., accusing the banks of helping to perpetuate a fraud at the now-bankrupt used-car dealer and lender.】

item.title: 金融股遭重挫，信用危机令股指跌至三个月低点
item.description: 对人工智能威胁的焦虑情绪加剧，加上私人信贷领域的投资突然动摇，导致银行和资产管理公司股价再度遭遇重挫。【原文：Heightened anxiety about the threat from artificial intelligence and suddenly shaky bets on private credit delivered another bruising selloff in shares of banks and asset managers.】

item.title: 特朗普在最高法院败诉后面临2000起关税诉讼
item.description: 自美国最高法院裁定特朗普总统大部分全球关税政策违法以来，已有逾百家企业提起新诉讼，这凸显出各界普遍担忧：政府不会轻易退还已征收的数十亿美元关税。【原文：In the days since the US Supreme Court declared most of President Donald Trump’s global tariffs illegal, more than 100 companies filed new lawsuits, underscoring widespread concerns that the administration won’t readily refund the billions of dollars it’s already collected.】

item.title: 美国寻求没收载有委内瑞拉石油的被扣押油轮
item.description: 美国政府已对一艘被扣押的油轮提起没收诉讼，该油轮载有180万桶原油。美方指控该船将伊朗和委内瑞拉的石油运往流氓政权。【原文：The US government has filed a forfeiture complaint for a seized oil tanker holding 1.8 million barrels of crude, alleging the ship transported oil from Iran and Venezuela to rogue regimes.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司年度亏损达26亿美元，尽管获得国家支持
item.description: 墨西哥国家石油公司公布年度亏损达452亿比索（约合26亿美元），引发市场担忧：总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆推出的巨额财政支持计划未能扭转这家负债累累的石油巨头的颓势。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos posted an annual loss of 45.2 billion pesos ($2.6 billion), stoking concerns that President Claudia Sheinbaum’s massive financial support package isn’t turning around the debt-burdened oil giant.】

item.title: 私募信贷公司Invico呼吁投资者管理资金外流风险
item.description: 私募信贷管理公司英维科资本已为旗下某只基金制定应对大型投资者赎回请求的方案，当前整个市场正面临日益加剧的资金撤离压力。【原文：Private credit manager Invico Capital Corp. has crafted a plan for one of its funds to deal with redemption requests from large investors, as firms face elevated withdrawal pressure across the broader market.】

item.title: 人类中心主义公司在与五角大楼的争端中获得其他科技从业者的支持
item.description: 人类本位PBC公司在与五角大楼关于军方如何使用人工智能的公关战中，因争议日益加剧而获得硅谷员工的支持。【原文：Anthropic PBC got a vote of support from Silicon Valley workers for its increasingly contentious public-relations battle with the Pentagon over how the military can use artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞士银行MBaer因涉嫌违反制裁令遭关闭
item.description: 瑞士当局因发现MBaer Merchant Bank AG协助客户规避制裁的证据，撤销了该行的执照，称其对瑞士及其金融体系构成风险。【原文：Swiss authorities revoked the license of MBaer Merchant Bank AG over evidence it helped clients evade sanctions, saying it had been a risk to the country and its financial system.】

item.title: 《宝可梦》系列新作《风与波》迎来任天堂经典IP三十周年
item.description: 电子游戏界历史最悠久的系列作品之一，再次立志要"收集所有精灵"。【原文：One of the longest-running franchises in video gaming is once again hoping to catch them all.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟撤回收购要约后，奈飞期权交易员坐拥1600万美元账面收益
item.description: 一位押注奈飞公司股价大涨的期权交易员目前坐拥约1600万美元账面收益，此前这家流媒体巨头撤回对华纳兄弟探索公司的收购要约后，其股价大幅飙升。【原文：An options trader who bet big on a Netflix Inc. rally is sitting on a roughly $16 million paper gain as shares soared after the streaming giant pulled its bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: 人工智能引发担忧，或将推高保险经纪人私人贷款成本
item.description: 德国某保险经纪公司的私人信贷贷款方正要求提高12亿欧元（约合14亿美元）贷款的利率，因担忧人工智能技术给该行业带来的风险。【原文：Private credit lenders to a German insurance broker are pushing for a higher margin on a €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion) loan due to fears of the risks AI poses to the sector.】

item.title: 亿万富翁Yandex创始人沃洛日放弃俄罗斯国籍
item.description: Yandex创始人阿尔卡季·沃洛日已放弃俄罗斯国籍，此前近两年他已出售在该国领先搜索引擎中的股份，以便全身心投入其荷兰新云公司Nebius Group NV的开发工作。【原文：Yandex founder Arkady Volozh has renounced his Russian citizenship nearly two years after he sold his interest in the country’s leading search engine to focus fully on developing his Dutch neocloud company Nebius Group NV.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉应美国要求否决哈里伯顿资产出售案
item.description: 在特朗普政府介入阻止出售后，委内瑞拉取消了对哈里伯顿公司被扣资产的拍卖。此举旨在为美国石油公司重返南美国家铺平道路。【原文：Venezuela canceled an auction of assets seized from Halliburton Co. after the Trump administration intervened to stop the sale, as President Donald Trump seeks to smooth the return of US oil companies to the South American country.】

item.title: 南非为力保就业向嘉能可冶炼厂提供更廉价电力
item.description: 南非为挽救就业岗位，向嘉能可公司的铬铁冶炼项目及萨曼科铬业公司的运营业务提供了更优惠的电价。【原文：South Africa has offered Glencore Plc’s ferrochrome smelting venture and Samancor Chrome Ltd.’s operations cheaper electricity in a bid to save jobs.】

item.title: 英国央行放宽危机规则计划将惠及特殊风险工具
item.description: 英国监管机构提议放宽一项在金融危机后出台的规则，该规则旨在降低金融复杂性。此举可能助推贷款机构为释放资本而进行的大规模风险转移。【原文：UK regulators have proposed relaxing a rule put in place after the global financial crisis to reduce financial complexity, a move that could fuel the rise of significant risk transfers used by lenders to free up capital.】

item.title: 标普500指数下跌，避险情绪主导市场，区块链裁员引发人工智能担忧
item.description: 美国股市开盘走低，避险情绪席卷市场，金融科技公司Block Inc.的大规模裁员加剧了市场对人工智能即将颠覆经济多个领域的担忧。【原文：US stocks opened lower as risk-off sentiment swept through markets and fintech Block Inc.’s massive layoffs fanned angst that artificial-intelligence is poised to upend broad sections of the economy.】

item.title: MFS债权人警告称，双重抵押导致9.3亿英镑资金缺口
item.description: 英国抵押贷款公司Market Financial Solutions Ltd.的若干债权人警告称，其贷款的抵押品可能存在9.3亿英镑（13亿美元）的缺口。该公司曾获得包括巴克莱银行在内的华尔街贷款机构支持，现已破产。【原文：Some creditors of Market Financial Solutions Ltd., the failed UK mortgage firm backed by Wall Street lenders including Barclays Plc, warned there may be a £930 million ($1.3 billion) shortfall in collateral backing their loans.】

item.title: 印度GDP数据修正意味着其超越日本所需时间将更长
item.description: 印度国内生产总值数据周五的重大修订显示，该国超越日本成为全球第四大经济体所需时间将比预期更长。【原文：Major revisions to India’s gross domestic product data Friday showed it will take longer than expected to surpass Japan as the world’s fourth-largest economy.】

item.title: 联合国称南苏丹面临重陷"全面战争"风险
item.description: 南苏丹的政治和军事领导人正在废除2018年签署的和平协议，将该国推向"全面战争"的边缘，并使今年举行选举的可能性日益渺茫。【原文：South Sudan’s political and military leaders are dismantling a 2018 peace agreement, driving the country toward “full-scale war” and making elections this year increasingly unlikely.】

item.title: 为何人工智能"恐慌交易"持续惊扰市场
item.description: 过去三年间，投资者争相布局人工智能相关领域，包括支撑尖端AI技术的高飞科技股。然而近期市场焦点已然转移——关于人工智能将取得巨大成功、可能取代众多行业与劳动力的预测，导致部分股票大幅下挫。华尔街将此现象称为"AI恐慌交易"。【原文：Over the past three years, investors have sought exposure to all things artificial intelligence, including high-flying tech stocks behind some of the leading AI technology. Recently, though, the market’s focus has shifted, as predictions that AI will be so successful that it might supplant the need for many types of businesses and workers has driven some stocks down sharply. Wall Street is calling it the “AI scare trade.”】

item.title: 巴克莱称德国国债创六年最佳开局后应抛售
item.description: 巴克莱策略师表示，现在是做空德国国债的好时机。【原文：It’s time to go short German government debt, according to strategists at Barclays.】

item.title: 据称苏黎世保险即将达成收购比兹利基金的协议，该交易由股权出售提供资金支持。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苏黎世保险集团正接近达成协议，将收购英国专业保险公司Beazley Plc，并筹集数十亿美元股权资金以支持该交易。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG is nearing an agreement to acquire UK specialty insurer Beazley Plc and raise billions of dollars in equity to help fund the deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德私募债务基金股息大幅削减后股价暴跌
item.description: 贝莱德旗下私募债务基金在早盘交易中股价下跌，此前该基金削减了股息。利率下降和不良贷款损失对业绩构成压力。【原文：A BlackRock Inc. private debt fund sank in early trading after cutting its dividend, as declining rates and losses on soured loans pressured results.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒正洽谈剥离社交平台Truth Social
item.description: 特朗普传媒与科技集团去年宣布与一家拥有近三十年历史的核聚变公司达成60亿美元合并协议，该公司表示正就将其旗下社交平台Truth Social分拆为独立公司进行谈判。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp., which last year announced a $6 billion merger with a nearly three-decade-old nuclear fusion company, said it is in talks to spin off its Truth Social unit into a separate company.】

item.title: 《商业周刊》如何分析Stake平台明星网红的老虎机游戏玩法
item.description:
调查发现，由加密货币赌场支付的顶级主播比其他主播更频繁地赢得大额奖金。【原文：

The investigation found that top streamers paid by the crypto casino won big more often than others.

】

item.title: 巴克莱考虑采用区块链平台处理支付与存款业务
item.description: 巴克莱银行正就创建区块链平台事宜与技术供应商进行接洽，该平台将用于处理支付等业务流程。此举使其与摩根大通等全球竞争对手一道，共同探索将数字资产技术应用于各类银行业务的可能性。【原文：Barclays Plc is sounding out technology providers on creating a blockchain platform for handling processes like payments, joining global rivals like JPMorgan Chase & Co. in exploring the use of digital-asset technology for various banking services.】

item.title: OpenAI以7300亿美元估值完成110亿美元融资
item.description: OpenAI在最新融资中筹集了110亿美元，公司估值达到7300亿美元。这是ChatGPT开发者迄今为止规模最大的融资轮，将助力其推进耗资巨大的计划——为人工智能开发获取更多计算资源和人才。【原文：OpenAI has raised $110 billion in a deal that values the startup at $730 billion, representing the ChatGPT maker’s largest funding round to date and bolstering its costly push to secure more computing power and talent for AI development.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格因服务业上涨幅度超预期
item.description: 1月份美国生产者价格涨幅超出预期，主要由服务业推动，表明通胀压力持续存在。【原文：Prices paid to US producers rose in January by more than forecast, fueled by services and pointing to lingering inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 加拿大第四季度国内生产总值萎缩0.6%，库存下降
item.description: 加拿大经济以疲软态势结束本年度，因企业库存急剧下降，第四季度实际国内生产总值按年率计算下滑0.6%。【原文：The Canadian economy ended the year on a softer note as a sharp decline in business inventories drove down real gross domestic product by an annualized 0.6% in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 培生首席执行官抨击因人工智能冲击而抛售的"短期"投资者
item.description: 皮尔森公司首席执行官表示，这家教育出版商因卷入更广泛的人工智能抛售潮而遭受短期投资者的不公正惩罚。【原文：Pearson Plc has been unfairly punished by short-term investors as the education publisher gets caught up in a broader artificial intelligence selloff, according to its chief executive officer.】
